name: honey
description: Honey is a self hosted bookmark manager with tagging, search and thumbnail previews. It lets users save and organize links in collections with a clean interface, acting as a personal or shared knowledge hub for the web.
features: Bookmark Management: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and tags.
Visual Previews: Automatic thumbnail generation for bookmarked websites.
Tag System: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging for easy organization.
Full-Text Search: Search through bookmark titles, descriptions, and tags instantly.
Collections: Group related bookmarks into collections for better organization.
Browser Extension: Save bookmarks directly from your browser with one click.
Import/Export: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers.
Sharing Options: Share bookmark collections publicly or with specific users.
